lead_paragraph: Fiji upset Wales, 38-34, to reach the Rugby World Cup quarterfinals for the first time in 20 years. The Fijians stunned Wales with 25 consecutive points in nine first-half minutes in Nantes, France. It was their first win in nine matches with the Welsh and sent them to a quarterfinal against South Africa on Oct. 7 in Marseille.
